sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Popover, Steps } from 'antd';
import { Card, Progress, message, Modal, Button, Tooltip, Typography } from 'antd'
import { CheckCircleOutlined, LikeOutlined, ExclamationCircleOutlined, SafetyOutlined, SendOutlined, AudioOutlined, CustomerServiceOutlined, SmileOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons';

const { Title } = Typography
const { Step } = Steps;

const Dashboard = () => {

  return (
    <Card>
      <Card>
        <Title>IVR Journey</Title>
        <Steps>
          <Step status="process" icon={<ExclamationCircleOutlined style={{ color: 'red' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<SendOutlined style={{ color: '#e67e22' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<AudioOutlined style={{ color: '#f39c12' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<CustomerServiceOutlined style={{ color: '#f1c40f' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<CheckCircleOutlined style={{ color: '#C4E538' }} />}/>
          <Step status="process" icon={<SmileOutlined style={{ color: '#2ecc71' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<SafetyOutlined style={{ color: 'green' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<LikeOutlined style={{ color: 'darkgreen' }} />} />
        </Steps>
      </Card>
      <Card>
        <Title>SMS Journey</Title>
        <Steps>
          <Step status="process" icon={<ExclamationCircleOutlined style={{ color: 'red' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<SendOutlined style={{ color: '#e67e22' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<AudioOutlined style={{ color: '#f39c12' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<CustomerServiceOutlined style={{ color: '#f1c40f' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<CheckCircleOutlined style={{ color: '#C4E538' }} />}/>
          <Step status="process" icon={<SmileOutlined style={{ color: '#2ecc71' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<SafetyOutlined style={{ color: 'green' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<LikeOutlined style={{ color: 'darkgreen' }} />} />
        </Steps>
      </Card>
      <Card>
        <Title>E-mail Journey</Title>
        <Steps>
          <Step status="process" title="Hi" icon={<ExclamationCircleOutlined style={{ color: 'red' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<SendOutlined style={{ color: '#e67e22' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<AudioOutlined style={{ color: '#f39c12' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<CustomerServiceOutlined style={{ color: '#f1c40f' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<CheckCircleOutlined style={{ color: '#C4E538' }} />}/>
          <Step status="process" icon={<SmileOutlined style={{ color: '#2ecc71' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<SafetyOutlined style={{ color: 'green' }} />} />
          <Step status="process" icon={<LikeOutlined style={{ color: 'darkgreen' }} />} />
        </Steps>
      </Card>
    </Card>
  )
}

export default Dashboard

// <Steps current={1} percent={60} size="small">

//   <Step title="Sent to vendor" subTitle="Left 00:00:08" description="This is a description." />
//   <Step title="Recording received" subTitle="Left 00:00:08" description="This is a description." />
